title: Twisted Mythology: Persephone
description: The myths tell us that Hades burst out of a crevice to abduct Persephone as she picked flowers on the plains of Nyssa alongside the daughters of Oceanus. The myths go on to tell us that Pirithous of Lapiths ventured down to the Underworld to abduct Persephone in order to make the goddess his wife.What if that is not the way it happened? What if Pirithous had abducted the goddess Persephone first?
author: Ashleigh Matthews
